de.fhbielefeld.ifm.persistence

Class DbAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhbielefeld.ifm.persistence.DbAccess

  • public class DbAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for loading and saving the Player-object. It assembles the retrieved data.
    Author:
    Dimitri Mantler
